titleStmt.title: The destruction of Troy, an essay upon the second book of Virgils Æneis. Written in the year, 1636.
Aeneis. Liber 2. English
titleStmt.author: Virgil.
Denham, John, Sir, 1615-1669.

notesStmt.note: Translated by Sir John Denham; published also in his Poems and translations. London, 1668.
Item at reel 2211:1 identified as Wing L933A (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and Bodleian Library.
